title.details: Good2Earn is a whole new concept designed by Cardboard Citizens... You have to do good to earn and all of our protocols aim at benefits the real world.

one.title: Provide Accountability
one.details:
We will work with profit and non-profit organizations by providing them accountability through our protocols for their Social Actions. (Recycling, reforestation, cleaning oceans..)
We use the Solana Blockchain enables the smart contracts we design to suit our Customers’ needs to deliver transactions at great speeds while keeping a low cost and low impact for the environment.

two.title: Incentives for good actions
two.details: The Community will have multiple activities that will allow them to earn income for the good actions they take. This income will be in the shape of local claimable coupons, NFT, SOL, SPL tokens, allowing to everyone multiple venues into taking actions.

three.title: The Community though our Protocols
three.details:
Citizens are the parties involved in operations of Cardboard Citizens web3 validation on our Solana smart contracts. Holders will be responsible for most of the web3 and blockchain responsibilities along the way.
These will be done by using their NFT token as their voting/validation weight to interact on key aspects along the journey of the project.
